20110128034643.000|20110128034645.000|TR0|today about the rally we're going to hold

20110128034647.000|20110128034649.000|TR0|that the issue is not what Kelly did or 
20110128034649.000|20110128034651.000|TR0|did not do.  It is the fact that there 
20110128034651.000|20110128034653.000|TR0|were millions of parents all across 
20110128034653.000|20110128034655.000|TR0|America who related to her story.  Because 
20110128034655.000|20110128034657.000|TR0|there are so many parts across the 
20110128034657.000|20110128034659.000|TR0|country, women in my family who have had 
20110128034659.000|20110128034701.000|TR0|to break the law a little bit in order to 
20110128034701.000|20110128034702.000|TR0|get their kids access to a quality 
20110128034702.000|20110128034704.000|TR0|education.
20110128034704.000|20110128034706.000|TR0|
20110128034706.000|20110128034708.000|TR0|So we really have to ask a broader 
20110128034708.000|20110128034710.000|TR0|question: why is it the case that there 
20110128034710.000|20110128034712.000|TR0|are some schools where the kids are not 
20110128034712.000|20110128034714.000|TR0|being taught what they need to know, the 
20110128034714.000|20110128034716.000|TR0|kids are not safe -- as safe as they would 
20110128034716.000|20110128034718.000|TR0|be in the suburbs, yet there are other 
20110128034718.000|20110128034720.000|TR0|schools that have everything they need?

20110128035614.000|20110128035615.000|TR0|the beef with Taco Bell.  Have you heard 
20110128035615.000|20110128035617.000|TR0|about this?

20110128035619.000|20110128035621.000|TR0|There's a law firm in Alabama that filed a 
20110128035621.000|20110128035623.000|TR0|class-action lawsuit against Taco Bell, 
20110128035623.000|20110128035625.000|TR0|saying that the meat at Taco Bell isn't 
20110128035625.000|20110128035627.000|TR0|very meaty. The lawsuit claims that Taco 
20110128035627.000|20110128035629.000|TR0|Bell's seasoned beef is less than 35 
20110128035629.000|20110128035631.000|TR0|percent beef, in fact.  And that its 
20110128035631.000|20110128035633.000|TR0|advertising is misleading.
20110128035633.000|20110128035635.000|TR0|
20110128035635.000|20110128035637.000|TR0|An attorney at the firm reportedly says 
20110128035637.000|20110128035639.000|TR0|that Taco Bell saves money by adds 
20110128035639.000|20110128035641.000|TR0|fillers, and that gives them a competitive
